change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "affiliate" was added by BC Reg 255/2010, effective August 24, 2010.
Section 2 (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 255/2010, effective August 24, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: persons, other than CPC/CBT and any other person, having a financial interest in the Waneta Expansion Project, are exempt from section 71 of the Act in respect of energy supply contracts for the purchase of CPC/CBT power service;
